command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2CLnct8dkeNkwEf.d4aab037a1db --database H3ST3PoK7akrmaFC8LSYTs --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE games
stdout:
Table	Create Table
games	CREATE TABLE `games` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `inviteCode` varchar(16) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `whitePlayerId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `blackPlayerId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `timeControl` varchar(16) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `initialTime` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `increment` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `currentFen` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `moveList` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('waiting','active','completed','abandoned') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'waiting',
  `result` enum('white_win','black_win','draw','abandoned') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `endReason` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `whiteTimeRemaining` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `blackTimeRemaining` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `lastMoveAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `isRated` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `startedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `endedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
